NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
What can be done to contain or destroy the Inspired and the deadly matter?
2
1
Solution 1: Contain the <color=orange>Inspired</color> within Dark Bramble
3 2
CASSAVA: This will without question, exterminate the anglerfish, as well as any undiscovered species dwelling within the bramble, though distance within the bramble protected them from the comet's arrival.
4
3
CASSAVA: Additionally, the bramble produces and scatters seeds connected back to the plant. The deadly matter could easily leak out into the star system through these seeds..
5
1
Solution 2: Attempt to orbit the Inspired around the sun, using its gravity to siphon off and destroy the deadly matter
6
5
CASSAVA: This would be recklessly dangerous. The pressures within Inspired will be too unstable at such close distance to the sun, and could cause far more devastating destruction...
7
1
Solution 3: Compact all matter within the Inspired, and launch it towards the asteroid belt
8
7
CASSAVA: No, there isn't enough time to calculate a new trajectory, now that the orbit has passed...
9
1
Solution 4: Replace the Inspired's core with a black hole warp core, creating a black hole to warp matter to its sibling core within the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color>
10
9
CASSAVA: The deep oceans surrounding the station should allow all captured matter to be completely contained within this space, safely quarantining it indefinitely.
11
10
CASSAVA: This is the safest and surest method of long-term containment, with the least potential for collective harm.
12
11
CASSAVA: Our journey has reached its end.. But if it means the survival of the star system and its species, I will gladly give my life to pave the road for theirs.
CONV CONV6 1
Stowaways DSS 5 12
